label: 長高様
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: The poetic style that served for descriptive poetry and that avoided literary conceits and contained words and imagery taken from the poetic arsenal of the Man'yōshū.  Poems in this style often painted grand sceneries, in which man had no place to speak of. [万葉集]
